critique: The document is an executive order establishing a White House Council on Strong Cities, Strong Communities. It aims to coordinate federal resources and technical assistance to help local communities address economic challenges. The order emphasizes collaboration between federal agencies and local entities to promote economic growth and sustainability. There is a focus on comprehensive planning and regional collaboration, with an emphasis on efficient use of federal resources. The order also calls for outreach to various stakeholders, including non-profit organizations, businesses, and local government agencies.
